---
title: "Create Cache Connection URL"
description: "Create Cache Connection generates a URL for users to create or update their cache connection."
api: POST https://cloud.cdata.com/api/job/cacheConnection/formLink
contentType: application/json
---



Returns a string containing the URL to redirect the user to. Users can then add their PostgreSQL connection information to this page.

### Payload Parameters

<ParamField path="redirectURL" type="string" required>
The URL to redirect the customer once the customer has edited the connection through the Connect AI UI.
</ParamField>

## Responses

### 200

A string containing the URL to redirect the user to. Users can then add their PostgreSQL connection information to this page.

`HTTP 200 OK`

<Expandable title="Response body">

<ResponseField name="redirectURL" type="string" required>
A string containing the URL to redirect the user to.
</ResponseField>

</Expandable>

<ResponseExample>


```json 200
{
    "redirectURL": "https://cloud.cdata.com/oem/user/cacheConnection?token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IlNJdTlCdjVjWU1HMDRMYW84YXh3T0E2Nlk5UVlBV0dQd05YeTA5Q1hlY3MiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..Wucf_8YhzGlggHr3DXMsJJYD7BpvcJTxFhJrYcWo9hF28gt684XES0Jh6VZ3YReFb0HVvQlqB_Vf7pkSC_seIPLXC4J7gVaX8oRBKgT6S8aIrNiyi_kZDueeRnBo3sVezUCmzCenEMcHA61H8H8-B7PDhMgOwaKWyFZCpL_ATHH7kTVYAVl8AoeG-z4A1RlwcSnbsoP4RZRgeOv9XEpz_0naviJ7TUyz54WlPAvdFwG6As_R0oI1oU6Nw7aXetphiTqmq3pAYk3FP__8KIkUSliEQv6-VxO6Ugc7CF97Dplzl7arBYkoGkVpv3Rk7jdteZYw0m_uRjKNjhfeB1Vexg&driver=PostgreSQL&redirectUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com&connectionName=OEMCacheConnection"
}
```

</ResponseExample>
